assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HRBPD_Add_AcknowledgementText
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: I authorize the above pre-tax salary deductions to be withheld from my bi-weekly pay. I authorize deduction rate increases or changes as required by the benefit provider in accordance with the terms and conditions of my policies. Pre-tax benefit changes are subject to the mid-year election change rules outlined in the benefit summary plan description.
